text: Subatomic Studios is an independent video game developer with offices in Cambridge, Massachusetts in the United States. ==History== Subatomic Studios was founded in 2008 by industry veterans Jamie Gotch, Leonardo Montenegro and Sergei Gourski.http://www.pocketgamer.co.uk/r/iPhone/Fieldrunners+(iPhone)/out_there.asp?c=13623 ==Games== * Fieldrunners * TinkerBox * Fieldrunners 2 ==References== ==External links== *Official website *"Subatomic Studios brings Fieldrunners to DSiWare" from Frisky Mongoose *"Fieldrunners 2 dashes to iPhone in June" Category:Video game development companies Category:Companies established in 2008 Category:Video game companies of the United States Category:Companies based in Massachusetts
title: Subatomic Studios
